title: Wounded Animal Hotline Contacts
description: Schema for the data file containing the list of Wounded Animal Hotline contacts. The root is an object containing a list of contacts.

$schema.description: A reference to the schema this data file conforms to. Should point to this file.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Schema for a single contact in the Wounded Animal Hotline database (v1.0.0).

coverage.description: An array of counties or a description of the geographic area served.

hours.description: The hours of operation, with '24/7' for always-on services.

services.description: A list of standardized service tags that define the contact's function.

animal_types.description: A list of specific animal categories the contact handles.

handles_rabies_vector_species.description: Indicates if the contact is equipped to handle species that are common carriers of rabies.

notes.description: Any other essential information, such as 'call first' or details about their specific capabilities.
